00038 // Define commonly used strings.
00039 define('WGA_NAME', __('Google AdSense'));
00040 define('WGA_CLEAN', 'widget_google_adsense');
00041 define('WGA_ELEMENT', 'widget-google-adsense');
00042 
00043 // Register hooks with WordPress core.
00044 add_action('plugins_loaded', 'widget_google_adsense_register'); // Fired after all other plugins, such as the Automattic Sidebar Widgets plugin for WordPress, has loaded.
00045 add_action('profile_personal_options', 'widget_google_adsense_profile_personal_options'); // An action intended for insertion of options into the personal profile option form.
00046 
00053 function widget_google_adsense_register() {
00054   // Check for the required plugin functions. This will prevent fatal
00055   // errors occurring when you deactivate the dynamic-sidebar plugin.
00056   if (!function_exists('register_sidebar_widget')) {
00057     return FALSE; // Missing Automattic Sidebar Widgets plugin (became core in WordPress v2.3)
00058   }
00059 
00060   // Initialize variables.
00061   $options = (array) get_option(WGA_CLEAN);
00062   $widget_ops = array('classname' => WGA_CLEAN, 'description' => __('A single advertisement unit. (Google limits to 3 per page.)'));
00063   $control_ops = array('width' => 220, 'height' => 50 * count(widget_google_adsense_options()), 'id_base' => WGA_CLEAN);
00064 
00065   // Register each instance of this widget.
00066   $id = '';
00067   foreach (array_keys($options) as $i) {
00068     $id = WGA_CLEAN .'-'. $i;
00069     // WARNING: wp_register_sidebar_widget() was not introduced until WordPress 2.2.
00070     // @TODO: Make backward-compatible? Find out how multiple widgets used to 
00071     //        work and switch back to that method if those functions are still 
00072     //        supported, even if deprecated.
00073     wp_register_sidebar_widget($id, WGA_NAME, 'widget_google_adsense', $widget_ops, array('number' => $i));
00074     wp_register_widget_control($id, WGA_NAME, 'widget_google_adsense_control', $control_ops, array('number' => $i));
00075   }
00076 
00077   // If there are no instances of this widget, register a generic widget.
00078   if (!$id) {
00079     wp_register_sidebar_widget(WGA_CLEAN .'-1', 'widget_google_adsense', WGA_CLEAN, $widget_ops, array('number' => -1));
00080     wp_register_widget_control(WGA_CLEAN .'-1', 'widget_google_adsense_control', $control_ops, array('number' => -1));
00081   }
00082 }
00083 
00090 function widget_google_adsense_options() {
00091   return array(
00092     'title' => '',
00093     'google_ad_client' => '',
00094     'google_ad_width' => 160,
00095     'google_ad_height' => 600,
00096     'google_ad_format' => '160x600_as',
00097     'google_ad_type' => 'text',
00098     'google_ad_channel' => '',
00099     'google_color_border' => '336699',
00100     'google_color_bg' => 'FFFFFF',
00101     'google_color_link' => '0000FF',
00102     'google_color_url' => '008000',
00103     'google_color_text' => '000000',
00104   );
00105 }

00115 function widget_google_adsense($args, $widget_args = 1) {
00116   extract($args, EXTR_SKIP);
00117   if (is_numeric($widget_args)) {
00118     $widget_args = array('number' => $widget_args);
00119   }
00120   $widget_args = wp_parse_args($widget_args, array('number' => -1));
00121   extract($widget_args, EXTR_SKIP);
00122 
00123   $options = get_option(WGA_CLEAN);
00124 
00125   // Compile Google AdSense variables for output in JavaScript format.
00126   $output = '';
00127   foreach($options[$number] as $key => $value) {
00128     if (substr($key, 0, 7) == 'google_') {
00129       $output .= $key ." = '". js_escape($value) ."';\n";
00130     }
00131   }
00132 
00133   // Apply WordPress filters.
00134   $title = apply_filters('widget_title', $options[$number]['title']);
00135 
00136   // Output to browser.
00137   print
00138     $before_widget .
00139     (empty($title)? '' :
00140       $before_title .
00141       $title .
00142       $after_title) .
00143     <<< XHTML
00144 <!-- Google AdSense -->
00145 <script type="text/javascript">
00146 //<![CDATA[
00147 {$output}
00148 //]]>
00149 </script>
00150 <script type="text/javascript" src="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/show_ads.js"></script>
00151 <!-- /Google AdSense -->
00152 XHTML
00153    .
00154    $after_widget;
00155 }

00160 function widget_google_adsense_control($widget_args) {
00161   global $wp_registered_widgets;
00162   static $updated = false;
00163 
00164   // Parse function arguments.
00165   if (is_numeric($widget_args)) {
00166     $widget_args = array('number' => $widget_args);
00167   }
00168   $widget_args = wp_parse_args($widget_args, array('number' => -1));
00169   extract($widget_args, EXTR_SKIP);
00170 
00171   // Load all widget options from database.
00172   $options = (array) get_option(WGA_CLEAN);
00173   $default_options = widget_google_adsense_options();
00174 
00175   // User made changes.
00176   if (!$updated && !empty($_POST['sidebar'])) {
00177     // Check for widget removal.
00178     $sidebar = (string) $_POST['sidebar'];
00179 
00180     $sidebars_widgets = wp_get_sidebars_widgets();
00181     if (isset($sidebars_widgets[$sidebar])) {
00182       $this_sidebar =& $sidebars_widgets[$sidebar];
00183     }
00184     else {
00185       $this_sidebar = array();
00186     }
00187     foreach ($this_sidebar as $_widget_id) {
00188       if (WGA_CLEAN == $wp_registered_widgets[$_widget_id]['callback'] && isset($wp_registered_widgets[$_widget_id]['params'][0]['number'])) {
00189         $widget_number = $wp_registered_widgets[$_widget_id]['params'][0]['number'];
00190         if (!in_array(WGA_CLEAN .'-'. $widget_number, $_POST['widget-id'])) { // the widget has been removed.
00191           unset($options[$widget_number]);
00192         }
00193       }
00194     }
00195 
00196     // Otherwise, gather changes to widget options.
00197     foreach ((array) $_POST[WGA_ELEMENT] as $widget_number => $widget) {
00198       foreach ($default_options as $key => $value) {
00199         if (array_key_exists($key, $widget)) {
00200           $options[$widget_number][$key] = strip_tags(stripslashes($widget[$key])); // sanitize user input
00201         }
00202       }
00203     }
00204 
00205     // Save changes to database.
00206     update_option(WGA_CLEAN, $options);
00207     $updated = TRUE;
00208   }
00209 
00210   if ($number == -1) {
00211     $number = '%i%'; // generates random number for new widgets
00212   }
00213 
00214   // Retrieve this widget's options specifically, relying on widget defaults to fill the gaps.
00215   $options[$number] = array_merge($default_options, (array) $options[$number]);
00216 
00217   // Generate form elements and output to browser.
00218   $output = '';
00219   foreach($options[$number] as $key => $value) {
00220     $value = attribute_escape($value);
00221     $label = ucwords(str_replace('_', ' ', $key)); // Make human-readable.
00222     $output .= '<p><label for="'. WGA_ELEMENT.'-'.$number.'-'.$key .'">'. $label .': '.
00223       '<input type="text" style="width:200px" '.
00224         'id="'. WGA_ELEMENT.'-'.$number.'-'.$key .'" '.
00225         'name="'. WGA_ELEMENT.'['.$number.']['.$key.']" '.
00226         'value="'. $value .'" /></label></p>';
00227   }
00228   $output .= '<input type="hidden" name="'. WGA_ELEMENT.'['.$number.'][submit]" value="1" />';
00229   print $output;
00230 }
00231 
00237 function widget_google_adsense_profile_personal_options() {
00238   if ($not_allowed) {
00239     return; // do not display the form field
00240   }
00241 
00242   $element = WGA_ELEMENT .'-publisher-id';
00243   $publisher_id = attribute_escape($profileuser->$$element);
00244   print 
00245     '<table class="form-table"><tr>'.
00246     '<th scope="row">'. __('Google AdSense Publisher ID') .'</th>'.
00247     '<td><label for="'. $element .'"><input type="text" name="'. $element .'" id="'. $element .'" value="'. $publisher_id .'" /></label><br />'.
00248     __('Required for advertising revenue.') .'</td>'.
00249     '</tr></table>';
00250 XHTML;
00251 }
